allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add documentation for Google Drive setup with Adobe AEM

Comprehensive guide covering setup steps, content structure, and authoring workflow for using Google Drive as a content source in AEM projects.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add AEM Edge Delivery Services project structure

Set up complete Adobe AEM project with:
- Configuration files \(package.json, eslint, stylelint, editorconfig\)
- Core JavaScript \(aem.js, scripts.js, delayed.js\)
- Monospace aesthetic CSS with 90s background pattern
- HTML templates \(head.html, 404.html\)
- Directory structure for blocks, styles, scripts, icons
- README with setup and development documentation

Preserves minimal design with Courier New font, fixed positioning
at 16.18vw/10vh, and transparent link borders with hover effects.
Ready for Google Drive content integration.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
